sharepointViewsTickT.title: Late tasks
sharepointViewsTickT.viewQuery:
<Where><And><Or><IsNull><FieldRef Name="PercentComplete" /></IsNull><Neq><FieldRef Name="PercentComplete" /><Value Type="Number">
                    1
                  </Value></Neq></Or><Lt><FieldRef Name="DueDate" /><Value Type="DateTime"><Today /></Value></Lt></And></Where><OrderBy><FieldRef Name="DueDate" /></OrderBy>

sharepointViewsChangT.title: My tasks
sharepointViewsChangT.viewQuery: <Where><And><Neq><FieldRef Name="PercentComplete" /><Value Type="Number">1</Value></Neq><Or><Membership Type="CurrentUserGroups"><FieldRef Name="AssignedPerson" /></Membership><Eq><FieldRef Name="AssignedPerson" /><Value Type="Integer"><UserID /></Value></Eq></Or></And></Where><OrderBy><FieldRef Name="ID" Ascending="FALSE" /></OrderBy>

sharepointViewsChangT.title: Late tasks

sharepointViewsSchT.title: Next 30 days
sharepointViewsSchT.viewQuery: <Where><And><Geq><FieldRef Name="StartDate" /><Value Type="DateTime"><Today /></Value></Geq><Lt><FieldRef Name="StartDate" /><Value Type="DateTime"><Today OffsetDays="30" /></Value></Lt></And></Where><OrderBy><FieldRef Name="StartDate" /></OrderBy>

sharepointViewsSchT.title: Next 7 days
